question: Can I take money from a Mushrik who wants to invest in my business??
answer:
QUESTION
I am a practising Muslim and own a business that I am trying to raise money for. Can I take money from a Mushrik who wants to invest in business?? Also can I take money from some one who owns a store that sells alcohol drinks???
ANSWER


Share:
It is permissible to invest a Mushrik's money in a business.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
